title: Hierarchical SegNet with Channel and Context Attention for Accurate Lung Segmentation in Chest X-ray Images
details: MA Labbaf Khaniki, N Mahjourian, M Manthouri - arXiv e-prints, 2024
abstract: Lung segmentation in chest X-ray images is a critical task in medical image analysis, enabling accurate diagnosis and treatment of various lung diseases. In this paper, we propose a novel approach for lung segmentation by integrating Hierarchical …
